en.title: Movement and child development: why it’s a foundation for learning
en.meta: Movement · Regulation · Learning · Read time: 7–10 min
en.hero_alt: Child engaging in movement to support development
en.intro: In childhood, movement is not just exercise: it helps regulate the body and prepares the brain for learning.
en.box_parent.title: Families You might recognise this if…
en.box_parent.li1: Your child is constantly on the move.
en.box_parent.li2: They get frustrated quickly with tasks or transitions.
en.box_parent.li3: They struggle to listen in noisy environments.
en.box_parent.li4: They need to move in order to focus.
